data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=2ZrGLULl7wQQ7kNvgEJIQCe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCxtRUME8X2DZuqiVpkhqIAUXs5NlwMWnAVFkjytGzguA&oe=665B0437)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=pwbfz4z-wWoQ7kNvgHMs8db&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCkng_GSzabGdSnhYLIe2IjFlVF54kyUfNJx4IDYWIelg&oe=665B11D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982555_716104293832637_6157177355803125122_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vI3KTDSHuXQQ7kNvgGjGbJ2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYACUFQOhIQ6L5tJZpqiI8qyzpJISRYXJ_eeLPeTP5kVWQ&oe=665B1550)
